news.title: Law Schools See an Increase in Bar Passage Rates, New ABA Data Shows
news.description: New data shows that 2019 first-time bar exam takers had a bar passage rate that was nearly 5 percentage points higher than for those who took the bar exam for the first time in 2018.

news.title: Ransomware Attacks Hit Three Law Firms in Last 24 Hours
news.description: At least five law firms, including three in a 24-hour period, have been targeted by hackers with ransomware attacks that are typically initiated with emails containing malicious attachments.
